title: Have You Ever Head A Dream That Saved Your Child's Life?
description:
We've heard the stories of people who have lucid dreams and experience sleep paralysis. Majority of the time, people talk about how creepy the dream is. But have you ever heard of some one seeing a figure during sleep paralysis that helped save a life?
Cassie has, and today she's sharing the story she found on TikTok with us.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: Pionaire Podcasting
